message: Let's split it evenly this time. We both get more than we would if we keep rejecting offers.
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers
I'm willing to give you a little more than last time, but I think we need to start getting closer to a deal.
Getting closer, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
Let's compromise! We're both losing money with each round, and we're getting closer to a deal.
